Diagnostic Solutions You Can Trust

For more than 30 years, MP Biomedicals has provided In Vitro Diagnostic (IVD) solutions to hospitals and clinical laboratories worldwide. With ISO-certified and FDA-approved manufacturing and distribution facilities throughout the globe, we are committed to providing superior products delivered when and where needed.

Infectious Disease

MP Diagnostics has decades of experience in the infectious disease diagnostics industry. Offering a wide range of products including immunoblot, rapid test, enzyme immunoassay and complementary instruments and accessories, MP Diagnostics continues to develop high quality products to meet industry demands worldwide.

MP Biomedicals offers a variety of EIA and RIA test kits for the quantitative determination of several endocrine system hormones including; thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH), Total T4, Free T3, corticosterone, estradiol, luteinizing hormone (LH), human growth hormone (hGH) and testosterone. Biogenic Amines

Biogenic amines are a group of naturally occurring amines derived by enzymatic decarboxylation of amino acids. They are primarily responsible for the regulation of cognitive processes but they also play a key role in memory and emotion, as well as in neuronal health and psychiatric disorders. Enzyme Immunoassay (EIA) and Radio Immunoassay (RIA) test kits provide the accurate assessment of the five biogenic amines neurotransmitters (dopamine, norepinephrine (noradrenaline), epinephrine (adrenaline), histamine and serotonin). MP Biomedicals offers Biogenic Amines RIA and EIA Test Kits for the in vitro diagnostic determination of biogenic amines in human serum or plasma as well as Research Use Only (RUO) applications.

Learn more >

Enzyme immunoassays (EIAs) provide a robust, quantitative method of measurement and surveillance of IgE, Gliadin, Rheumatoid Factor, dsDNA, Thyroglobulin, and Thyroid Peroxidase. Autoimmune disease states are identified and monitored through the quantitative detection of IgG, IgM or IgA antibodies. uctus lobortis. Mauris porttitor venenatis aliquet. Ut at viverra nisi. Newborn Screening

Babies can be born with a wide array of inborn disorders that impact development and metabolism. Timely screening and diagnosis of these disorders is paramount in avoiding severe debilitation or premature death. Newborn screening programs have been gaining traction globally for decades and has been government mandated in the United States since the 1960's. We offer immunoassay kits to screen for Congenital Hypothyroidism, Phenylketonuria, Galactosemia, Cystic Fibrosis and Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia.

Learn more >

Tumor Markers

Our normal, non-cancerous cells produce tumor markers that are routinely found circulating in the blood stream in low concentrations. When a cancerous cell is present, the tumor markers become over produced and can be used as an indicator of disease progression. MP Biomedicals offers both EIA kits and Rapid Tests for detecting tumor markers in blood samples.
